install_msg:
**Thank you for installing the Adventure cog, based on the GoblinsComic Adventure Party cog by locastan.**

```
┌────────────┬────────────┐
│    ┌───────┴───────┐    │
├────┤ W A R N I N G ├────┤
│    └───────┬───────┘    │
└────────────┴────────────┘ 
```

```
Unload the earlier version of this cog by using the [unload gobcog] command before loading the adventure cog. Only applies to users upgrading from GobCog. There is no conversion available for users that were utilizing earlier versions of this cog - think of this as a fresh new adventure!```
```
